mediadata.title: The Anglo Indian story of Partition: LAUNCH Day 3 with Vishwajeet Deshmukh
mediadata.description: 193 views  Streamed live on Jun 9, 2021  The Anglo Indian experience of Partition is rarely talked about and hasn't enjoyed the attention and study it deserves.  Vishwajeet Deshmukh hopes to change that with a Tata Trust - Partition Archive Research grant.  Today, he will speak more about his research work.
